Uses of Class
net.kuujo.copycat.io.DirectBuffer

  • Packages that use DirectBuffer 
    Package Description
    net.kuujo.copycat.io
    Provides a low-level Buffer abstraction backed by on- or off-heap memory, memory mapped files, or RandomAccessFile.

    • Uses of DirectBuffer in net.kuujo.copycat.io

      Methods in net.kuujo.copycat.io that return DirectBuffer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static DirectBuffer DirectBuffer.allocate()
      Allocates a direct buffer with an initial capacity of 4096 and a maximum capacity of Long.MAX_VALUE.
      static DirectBuffer DirectBuffer.allocate(long capacity)
      Allocates a fixed capacity direct buffer.
      static DirectBuffer DirectBuffer.allocate(long initialCapacity, long maxCapacity)
      Allocates a new direct buffer.
